entries.name: Robo Kabaddi

entries.name: DSAI Hackathon
entries.description: Whether you're a novice eager to dive into the world of data and tech or an experienced enthusiast driven by passion, we've got your back at the DSAI Hackathon! Showcase your problem-solving prowess as you tackle tasks to build chatbots, log ingestor, etc.

entries.name: Smart Automation Hackathon
entries.description: Build a solution to solve some of the new issues we came across in the permanent campus. Eg- mess card system tracker, internal slot booking system for student council to avoid collisions, etc.

entries.name: Code hunt
entries.description: Hacking , CodeCompletion , CodeCorrection (Online)(Team)  , DecipherBox
